name: templ-project-nodejs-addon-node-api
description: NodeJs Addon Project Template using Node Addon Api

scripts.build:addon:cmake: npx cmake-js configure && npx cmake-js build
scripts.build:addon:gyp: npx node-gyp configure && npx node-gyp build
scripts.ca:lint: npm run prettier:write && npm run lint:write
scripts.ca:quality: npm run jscpd && npm run depcruise
scripts.ca:security: npm run license-check && (npm audit --production || yarn audit --groups=dependencies)
scripts.ca: npm run ca:lint && npm run ca:quality && npm run ca:security
scripts.docs: documentation build src/** -f html -o docs; documentation build src/** -f json -o docs.json
scripts.license-check: license-checker --production --json --failOn='AGPL AGPL 1.0; AGPL 3.0; CDDL or GPLv2 with exceptions; CNRI Python GPL Compatible; Eclipse 1.0; Eclipse 2.0; GPL; GPL 1.0; GPL 2.0; GPL 2.0 Autoconf; GPL 2.0 Bison; GPL 2.0 Classpath; GPL 2.0 Font; GPL 2.0 GCC; GPL 3.0; GPL 3.0 Autoconf; GPL 3.0 GCC; GPLv2 with XebiaLabs FLOSS License Exception; LGPL; LGPL 2.0; LGPL 2.1; LGPL 3.0; Suspected Eclipse 1.0; Suspected Eclipse 2.0'
scripts.lint:write: npm run lint:cpp:write && npm run lint:js:write
scripts.lint: npm run lint:cpp && npm run lint:js
scripts.prettier:check: npm run prettier:cpp:check && npm run prettier:js:check
scripts.prettier:write: npm run prettier:cpp:write && npm run prettier:js:write
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier:cpp && npm run prettier:js

author: Dragos Cirjan
